name: The Sims 4: Idle: Scratch Edition
description:
If the game does not load then go to https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/513103374/.

For full instructions go here: https://cutt.ly/qc9mjXo Build mode wont work on mobile Select the correct options to keep your Sim alive and well! The 1st moodlet on the top is mood, which can be filled by filling needs. The 2nd moodlet is energy which can be filled by sleeping. The 3rd one is hygiene which can be filled by getting and using your shower.. The 4th on is hunger/food. The 5th one is bladder/bathroom. The 3 icons on the right are skills, these can earn you money. The number nearest to the skill icon are the skill level, the higher it is the more money you get when you use the skill. The number 2nd nearest to the icon is skill cooldowns. To use build mode press and hold a number 1 - 3 on your keyboard, select what you want to buy and click to buy it while holding the number if you have enough §. When you buy it it will increase your decor by 1. If your decor reach 3 or 5 it boosts your mood! if you buy couch you unlock new interaction. You must pay bills for § 285, if you dont you get in a fight lose all your energy and bladder.

Notes and Credits

Troubleshooting Guide and Bugs - If a skill option disappears on game start, restart the game twice (press the green flag 2 times), if it still occurs reload the page - If the needs don't reset upon game start, reload the site. - the build mode will break after clicking work interaction - comment more issues for more troubleshooting guides.
